name: The Quest for the Candies
storyline: Dry Bowser has stolen the candies, and without them, people can’t go trick-or-treating, because nobody has candy! It’s up to Mario to defeat Dry Bowser and save Halloween!
summary: This is a Halloween-themed hack that was started in 2019 and finished in 2022. There are 34 exits, spread across 5 worlds.
